summary: TRANSMISSION FAILED AFTER THE CAR HAD 55000 MILES.  THE PROBLEM COMMENCED WITH A NOTICEABLE SHUDDER AND JERK WHEN ACCELERATING AND BRAKING.  THE CAR EVENTUALLY STOPPED ACCELERATING ALL TOGETHER.  TRANSMISSION HAD TO BE REPLACED.  THIS SEEMS TO BE A COMMON OCCURRENCE WITH THIS ALTIMA MODEL.  PLEASE INVESTIGATE.  SEE LINK: HTTPS://WWW.CARS.COM/ARTICLES/2013-2016-NISSAN-ALTIMA-ROGUE-TRANSMISSION-ISSUE-1420683183828/
